textos_fuente.text: Staff Archive - Clark Lindsey Village Volunteer Careers Resources Donate Resident Login Community Portal Life at ClarkLindsey Independent Living Memory Care atHome Home Care Care Services Assisted Living Rehabilitation Skilled Nursing Contact Life at ClarkLindsey Independent Living Memory Care atHome Home Care Care Services Assisted Living Rehabilitation Skilled Nursing Contact Volunteer Careers Resources Donate Resident Login Community Portal Our Team About ClarkLindsey Purposeful. Passionate. People. Central to ClarkLindsey’s success are our dedicated board members and staff, who are committed to fostering meaningful experiences for our residents and continuously improving our campus. Our volunteer board of directors represent a wide range of expertise. Their talents ensure the quality services and management of our organization. The commitment of our staff, exhibited through exemplary leadership, is invaluable to enriching the lives of older adults, both within our organization and in the surrounding community. We thank them all for devoting their time, talent and expertise to advancing the mission and vision of ClarkLindsey. PRICE THIS VENUE 1 / 6 Provided By: Clark Plantation Report Clark Plantation 352-222-3906 CALL VENUE FAVORITE Venue highlights Indoor and outdoor spaces BYO Valet parking Venue details Style: Rustic & Barn, Vintage Guest capacity: Accommodates up to 200 guests Services: Ceremony / Reception Indoor / Outdoor VIEW OPTIONS Location: 3682 South West 202nd Street Newberry, FL 32669 Description: Whether you're dreaming of a large outdoor celebration overlooking North Florida's gentle, rolling hills or you envision an intimate gathering in a beautiful barn, The Clark Plantation offers the perfect setting for your wedding day. The Clark Plantation boasts a gorgeous natural setting, a beautiful, open, rustic barn, and all the amenities to make your wedding day unmatched! Say "I do," beneath the shade of towering oak trees surrounded by loved ones and impeccably landscaped grounds.  The ceremony site comes with 30 quaint benches for seating. After the ceremony, guests can mix and mingle over cocktails and appetizers before moving into the barn for your fabulous reception! Indulge in a delicious catered meal then dance the night away. This beautifully-appointed venue is ideal for couples with a bohemian, country chic, or rustic-inspired theme. The friendly and professional staff will work with you, your coordinators, photographers, and decorators to ensure a memorable, once-in-a-lifetime celebration! READ MORE Additional details Service Options Venue notes The rental fee is $3,500 for a ceremony and reception and includes a Friday through Sunday rental of entire property. A refundable security deposit of $500 is required. Amenities and Restrictions Amenities - Bride's dressing area - Groom's dressing area - Outdoor lighting - Venue set up and clean up - Day-of coordinator - Full kitchen facilities - Large parking lot - Ceremony chairs provided - Reception tables provided Restrictions - BYO alcohol - No rice, birdseed, confetti, etc. - Approved outside caterer allowed - Amplified music OK indoors and outdoors - Smoking in designated areas only - Music must end by 10:30PM Amenities - Bride's dressing area - Groom's dressing area - Outdoor lighting - Venue set up and clean up - Day-of coordinator - Full kitchen facilities - Large parking lot - Ceremony chairs provided - Reception tables provided Restrictions - BYO alcohol - No rice, birdseed, confetti, etc. - Approved outside caterer allowed - Amplified music OK indoors and outdoors - Smoking in designated areas only - Music must end by 10:30PM Links Clark Plantation 352-222-3906 CALL VENUE FAVORITE Venue Highlights Indoor and outdoor spaces BYO Valet parking STARTING AT $4,180 FOR 50 GUESTS Price this venue to get your customized estimate, no strings attached PRICE THIS VENUE Interested in this venue? Join now View all outsourcing firms Clark Staff Get a free quote Contact company Overview At our company, we value each customer as if they are our only one. Whether you have one staff member or 100, we provide consistent and high-quality service. As an American-owned and operated BPO company, we adhere to western standards of business. This is crucial in understanding your expectations and scaling your business effectively. We know what it takes to succeed and are dedicated to helping you reach your goals. What Clark Staff offers its clients We believe in a transparent and straightforward partnership. Our goal is to help you succeed, and we approach every situation with a win-win-win mindset. We'll collaborate with you to improve your chances of success, and we'll be there for you through thick and thin. How Clark Staff outshines the competition There are several ways in which we outshine our competition: 1 - Commitment to quality: We have a rigorous selection process for our employees, ensuring that we hire the best talent. We also provide ongoing training and support to ensure that our team is up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies. 2- Customer-centric approach: Our focus is always on the needs and goals of our customers. We listen carefully to their requirements, and work with them to develop customized solutions that meet their specific needs. 3- Flexibility: We offer a range of services with different pricing models to suit the needs of our customers. We also have the ability to scale up or down quickly, depending on our clients' needs. 4- Transparency: We believe in clear and open communication with our clients. We provide regular updates and reports, so our customers always know what's happening with their project. 5- Western-standard business practices: As an American-owned and operated company, we adhere to western standards of business. This means that we have a deep understanding of our customers' expectations and can help them to scale their business effectively. Overall, our commitment to quality, customer-centric approach, flexibility, transparency, and western-standard business practices set us apart from our competition. Clark Staff company structure Clark Staff is a privately held outsourcing corporation with a strong reputation for providing high-quality, reliable, and cost-effective outsourcing solutions. The company was founded by 2 American entrepreneurs who have personally experienced the benefits of outsourcing for their own businesses. With this firsthand knowledge, the owners understand the challenges and opportunities that come with outsourcing, and they are committed to helping clients maximize the benefits and minimize the risks. In addition to the experienced ownership team, Clark Staff has three, soon to be four minority employee-owners who share the owners' passion for providing top-notch outsourcing services. The company is proud to have a diverse team of experts who bring unique perspectives and skills to every project. Clark Staff has primarily operated as a referral-based business, with satisfied clients serving as the company's best advocates. However, the company has recently expanded its marketing efforts to reach even more businesses in need of outsourcing solutions. Clark Staff understands that outsourcing can be a game-changer for businesses of all sizes, and the team is eager to help clients achieve their goals. The company's decision-making is governed by a board of directors, which is responsible for major decisions affecting the business, and day-to-day operations. Whether you're looking to reduce your overhead costs, streamline your operations, or boost your productivity, Clark Staff is your trusted partner for outsourcing needs. The company's team of experts will work with you to understand your unique needs and deliver customized solutions that work for you. Contact Clark Staff today to learn more about how the team can help your business thrive! Sample highlight service offering of Clark Staff Introducing our unbeatable "Best Deal" service offering! With our remote staffing solution, you can save over 60% compared to hiring someone onsite for the same position. For example, an average accountant in the US makes $3,000 a month, while in the Philippines, they make between $700 and $1,500 a month - that's a significant cost-saving opportunity! Plus, we provide highly skilled and specialized employees who work diligently to integrate into your company's culture and management hierarchy, no matter where they are located. Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to maximize your resources and boost your business's success! Read more.. Headquarters 7901 4th St N, STE 5354, Clark Staff LLC, 33702, St Petersburg, FL Public or Private private Seats or staff 1000-4999 Revenue $250 mil. - $500 mil. Industries Advertising & PR Construction Renovation Consumer Services Digital Marketing Ecommerce Education Educational Businesses Energy Entertainment Financial Services Food & Beverage Game Dev & Support Government Hardware Tech/IT Healthcare Hospitality Insurance IT Services and IT Consulting Legal Manufacturing Media Publishing Mining Non Profit Others Pharmaceutical Public Utilities Real Estate Recruiting Staffing Retail SaaS Software Tech/IT Telecoms Transportation Travel Utilities Details Executive Russell Meiselman Year Founded 05/20/2014 Countries of fulfillment Australia Canada El Salvador India Mexico New Zealand Philippines United Kingdom United States Sectors Admin Support Animation & Multimedia Build-Operate-Transfer Customer Service Digital & Content Marketing Engineering & Architecture Finance & Accounting Full service BPO Human Resource & Legal IT Services and IT Consulting Office Leasing Outsourcing Consultancy Seat Leasing BPO Software & Application Development Specialized BPO Vertical Contact information +1-888-652-0077 [email protected] https://www.clarkstaff.com Contact company Contact company About Clark Staff: Review and comparison Clark Staff is an American-owned remote staffing company that has successfully operated since 2003. Its primary objective is to empower small and mid-sized companies by providing them with resources that were once exclusively accessible to Fortune 500 companies. Within the management ranks of Clark Staff, they boast over 60 years of collective experience in the BPO industry. Its expertise lies in assisting companies in building, managing, and expanding their remote teams on a global scale. Clark Staff specializes in seven significant industries, bringing its expertise to the following sectors: Architectural / Engineering industries Financial industry Medical industry Real estate industry Start-ups and tech industries Call center industry Promotional products industry Its experience and knowledge in these fields enable them to provide tailored solutions and support to clients within each industry. Clark Staff is dedicated to helping businesses thrive and achieve their goals in the remote work landscape. Clark Staff Outsourcing Clark Staff’s extraordinary journey began with its visionary company founders, Russell Meiselman and Zack Williamson. They found themselves in the unique position of managing remote staff as customers seek outsourcing solutions. Zack embarked on a career in the Mortgage industry, whereas Russell emerged from the security sector. Both encountered the need to employ, construct, and oversee remote teams through outsourcing companies spread across the globe. At the beginning of 2013, Russell Meiselman and Zack Williamson took proactive steps by establishing their own BPO company in the Philippines. United in their mission, they recognized the global necessity for a trustworthy and forthright organization that collaborates with its partners, providing clear guidance on possible actions, limitations, best practices, and the key factors contributing to successful remote staffing. Clark Staff’s BPO services and pricings At Clark Staff, they take pride in offering comprehensive services that cater to a wide range of business requirements. These services are meticulously designed to address and, in most cases, fulfill your organizational needs. Remote staffing Clark Staff remote staffing service caters to individuals and organizations seeking cost-effective solutions to fulfill specific job requirements. Whether you require the expertise of a single specialist or the composition of an entirely remote workforce, it offers the flexibility to accommodate your unique needs. Hourly Clark Staff offers an hourly and projects service that provides a plug-and-play solution for remote staff members. It is available to you precisely when you require their expertise. This service is ideally suited for business owners who seek professionals to handle specific tasks without needing permanent roles. Seat leasing and incubation Clark Staff seat leasing service is tailored for business owners who have already hired staff but require infrastructure support. This outsourcing provider offers a comprehensive solution by providing fully equipped workstations, high-speed internet connectivity, PCs, and more to facilitate a productive work environment for your existing team. B.O.T. Clark Staff’s plug-and-play business model offers an outsourcing service designed for individuals who aspire to establish their own business in the Philippines while bypassing the typical challenges associated with start-ups. Recruitment process outsourcing – RPO Clark Staff offers the opportunity to add recruiters to your team at a fraction of the usual expenses or even hire a complete remote recruitment department. Clark Staff BPO’s pricing Are you ready to take your business to new heights through the power of outsourcing? Schedule a FREE discovery call with the team of experts at Clark Staff to explore the wide range of possibilities and discover how its services can benefit your organization. How Clark Staff outshines its competition Clark Staff distinguishes itself in unique ways. It has two distinct types of employees: internal team and client staff, which refers to the employees they provide to its clients. Their internal team consists of skilled recruitment, HR, and IT professionals. These individuals possess extensive experience in their respective fields and undergo continuous training to stay abreast of the ever-changing dynamics of our industry. By investing in their professional development, Clark Staff ensures that its internal team remains well-equipped to meet the evolving needs of the clients. On the other hand, its client staff comprises qualified candidates who meet the specific client requirements, aligned with the company’s unique culture and skillset. This firm meticulously screens and selects individuals who possess the necessary qualifications and qualities that are within your organization’s values and work environment. Clark Staff aims to foster a productive and harmonious working relationship by carefully matching client staff to your company’s needs. Rest assured that the internal team and client staff are professionals committed to delivering exceptional results. Key executives Russell Meiselman ​ (President and Co-Founder) Russell Meiselman was a natural-born entrepreneur, exhibiting his business understanding from an early age. During high school, he ventured into launching his own small business. After completing his education, Russell transitioned into a role as a salesman, demonstrating exceptional skills that propelled him to a managerial position. Drawing on his expertise, he then delved into business consulting. Zack Williamson (CEO and Co-Founder) Zack Williamson’s professional journey has taken him across the globe, where he gained valuable experience working with various companies in four major industries: BPO, digital marketing, telecommunications, and web/software development. After his extensive travels and diverse career, Zack established his own business, marking the inception of Clark Staff. This pivotal step represented his commitment to building a company that provides exceptional staffing services. Clark Staff reviews and comparisons Clark Staff has proudly earned a 5-star rating from the Chamber of Commerce . This achievement reflects its dedication to delivering top-notch services and maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction. Clark Staff is honored to receive recognition for its commitment to excellence. Clark Staff’s contact information Clark Staff’s main headquarters is located in: 7901 4th St N, STE 5354, Clark Staff LLC, 33702, St Petersburg, FL Further, you may virtually reach out the company through the following contact information: Website https://www.clarkstaff.com LinkedIn http://www.linkedin.com/company/clarkstaffing Facebook https://www.facebook.com/weareclarkstaff In addition, you may email them at [email protected] or call +1-888-652-0077. About Derek Gallimore Derek Gallimore has been in business for 20 years, outsourcing for over eight years, and has been living in Manila (the heart of global outsourcing) since 2014. Derek is the founder and CEO of Outsource Accelerator, and is regarded as a leading expert on all things outsourcing. By Amber Pellicone Published : Feb. 23, 2021 at 6:54 AM EST Email This Link Share on Facebook Share on X (formerly Twitter) Share on Pinterest Share on LinkedIn GAINESVILLE, Fla. (WCJB) - Brides and grooms will soon be able to say ‘I do’ again at Clark Plantation in Newberry. For over three years, it was a picture perfect wedding venue complete with a beautiful barn overlooking rolling hills and tall Oak trees. That was until the barn burnt down last February, the cause still unknown. The Clark family was devastated, but thankful for the community coming together to help raise money for the rebuild. RELATED STORY: UPDATE: Newberry mayor creates GoFundMe to assist Clark Plantation rebuilding Now six weeks into construction, Owner Mark Clark said they’re hopeful for whats to come. “We’re getting ready for concrete at that point it will really come alive so the barn or look similar we got a little bit better amenities,” said Clark. “We’re booking right now as we speak, we’ve already had several showings. Even though you don’t see the beauty of it as it is now, it’s coming and will be a very beautiful place.” To keep up with the latest local news subscribe to our TV20 newsletter HERE and receive news straight to your email every morning. Once complete, the venue is expected to be bigger than the last with higher ceilings and an added fireplace. The first wedding is scheduled for October. Copyright 2021 WCJB. All rights reserved.
